objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='bgGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#1E242E'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#3B3F47'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='accentGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#A8A9AD'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#D1D3D6'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bgGradient)'/><g opacity='0.1'><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='400' fill='none' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='none' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='200' fill='none' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/></g><g opacity='0.15'><rect x='0' y='300' width='1080' height='1' fill='#FFFFFF'/><rect x='0' y='780' width='1080' height='1' fill='#FFFFFF'/></g><g opacity='0.05'><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='50' fill='url(#accentGradient)'/><circle cx='980' cy='980' r='70' fill='url(#accentGradient)'/><circle cx='980' cy='100' r='30' fill='url(#accentGradient)'/><circle cx='100' cy='980' r='40' fill='url(#accentGradient)'/></g><g opacity='0.1'><path d='M 0,0 L 200,200' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M 1080,0 L 880,200' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M 0,1080 L 200,880' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M 1080,1080 L 880,880' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='1'/></g></svg>

objects.text: Ultimate Power, Unmatched Elegance in Space Gray

Premium Design • Liquid Retina Display • M-Series Chip
Apple Pencil Support • All-Day Battery • 5.9mm Thin Profile

product_details.name: iPad Pro - Ultimate Power, Unmatched Elegance in Space Gray
product_details.description:
• Premium all-aluminum unibody design in sleek Space Gray finish
• Advanced camera system with Ultra Wide lens and LiDAR Scanner
• Stunning edge-to-edge Liquid Retina display
• Powerful performance with Apple M-series chip
• Support for Apple Pencil and Magic Keyboard
• All-day battery life for maximum productivity
• Ultra-thin profile at just 5.9mm
• Wi-Fi 6 and optional 5G connectivity
• Face ID for secure authentication
• Professional-grade audio with four-speaker system
• iPadOS optimized for touch, pencil, and keyboard input
• Thunderbolt/USB 4 port for high-speed connectivity

banner_details:
The banner presents a sleek and modern promotional design for a tech product, highlighted by a central product image ("product_image") placed over a dark, futuristic radial gradient background with subtle circular and linear graphical accents that convey precision and innovation. The main title ("heading") is bold and centered at the top, with a subtler tagline ("subheading") beneath in a light gray, adding sophistication. A feature-rich description ("description") is centered under the product image in crisp white. The price ("price") is prominent in bold typography, followed by a strong call-to-action button with a solid fill ("cta_background") and high-contrast text ("cta"). 

**Color Palette**:
- Background Gradient: #1E242E → #3B3F47  
- Accent Gray: #A8A9AD  
- Highlight Gray: #D1D3D6  
- Button Fill: #A8A9AD  
- CTA Text: #1E242E  
- White Text: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek, modern iPad with a refined Space Gray finish. The primary colors used include a metallic gradient of dark gray (#2C2C2E) and light silver-gray (#A3A3A3), smoothly blending across the aluminum body to reflect light subtly. The black Apple logo (#000000) stands out prominently, adding contrast and brand identity. The blending transitions are soft, enhancing a premium and minimalistic aesthetic. This palette works well for an advertisement banner by using monochromatic tones with strategic highlights in white (#FFFFFF) and silver-blue accents (#8E8E93) to enhance depth and modern appeal while keeping the look clean and sophisticated.
